mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST_LIKE ( POST_ID, USER_ID) VALUES ( #{postId}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT P.POST_ID AS POST_ID, P.TITLE AS TITLE, P.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME, P.SUB_CATE_NM AS SUB_CATE_NM, P.CREATED_AT AS CREATED_AT, COALESCE(COUNT(PL.POST_ID), 0) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM POST P LEFT JOIN POST_LIKE PL ON P.POST_ID = PL.POST_ID WHERE P.CATEGORY_ID != 0 GROUP BY P.POST_ID, P.TITLE, P.NICKNAME, P.SUB_CATE_NM, P.CREATED_AT ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC, P.CREATED_AT DESC
